Html: In the new project assigned to me I have a build a WPF application using PRISM. I was looking for a sample PRISM application which defines the structure/architecture of a standard PRISM based application. It would be really helpful if you can provide me with the same as a point of reference.

Hi,

I recommend you to check the Stock Trader Reference Implementation provided with Prism, as it illustrates the baseline architecture used with Prism. Also, as you may find the Prism library also includes many Quickstarts that could be used as a reference when building your application, although compared to the Reference Implementation these are focused on how to implement specific features of the guidance.

Additionally, I believe you could also find David Hill's Prism Templates interesting, as they provide a starting application structure commonly used with Prism, from where you can evolve to your own requirements.

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
